about_the_game:
Legacy Of Sin ill-boding is an epic strategy game, combining massive real-time battles with turn-based management of your city and lands. You are the leader of the survivors, commanding your forces to ensure security. Your goal is not only to survive but to thrive while investigating the magical calamity that nearly brought society to collapse. Can you turn a small settlement into a great kingdom? It won't be an easy task.

Game Description

Throughout the game, you will have to fight battles, construct new buildings, research new ideas, feed your people, and employ all your skills and cunning as a warrior. You will also have to deal with powerful allies who will aid you in this endeavor. You will need to train your kingdom's military forces and lead them into battle. At the same time, you must ensure that your kingdom's lands are developed and managed properly, so that you have enough money to fund your progress. The path to saving humanity's last kingdom is at your feet. The journey begins with the first step...

Combate

Legacy Of Sin ill-boding is a real-time strategy, RPG, survival and route defense game. Command unique troops, control the battlefield, defend routes from different enemies! Take control of an army of soldiers fighting to survive! Win and gain experience to unlock new upgrades and unique abilities for the battlefield. It's up to you to understand the strengths and weaknesses of each character and apply the best strategy to win!



Collect new items and equipment to improve your soldiers.

Developer Message

Legacy of Sin ill-boding is the culmination of this series, where we finally managed to implement our ideas into the game, many of which were conceived years ago for our first game but only now have we had the knowledge and resources to implement them. Realizing this project is a dream come true, a work that we hope will stand the test of time for its engaging art and gameplay. Everything was done meticulously, requiring a lot of time, sweat, and personal resources from those committed to the project. We spared no expense, and the result is a work of art that we can be proud of. See you later friends!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux Mint
  • Processor: i3-9100F
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Gt 710 2gb
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux Mint
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 780
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% DirectX 10 compatible

short_description: The world as we knew it no longer exists. Join the few remaining survivors, lead them, and build your city, feed your people and organize your defenses to survive the hordes of enemies attacking your kingdom, mankind's last kingdom, our hope. Can you turn a small village into a great realm?
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Arabic*, Bulgarian*, Czech*, Danish*, Dutch*, Finnish*, Greek*, Hungarian*, Japanese*, Korean*, Norwegian*, Polish*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Romanian*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Spanish - Latin America*, Swedish*, Thai*, Traditional Chinese*, Turkish*, Ukrainian*, Vietnamese*, Spanish - Spain*, Indonesian*
*languages with full audio support
